mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart VALUES (seq_cartnum.nextval, #{m_id}, #{item_num},#{item_qty},(select item_price from item where item_num=#{item_num}*#{item_qty}), sysdate,#{p_store},#{p_request_date}, #{p_request_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET item_qty=#{item_qty}, item_tot=((select item_price from item where item_num=#{item_num})*#{item_qty}) WHERE cart_num = #{cart_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart natural join item where cart_num = #{cart_num}
